step2.title: Step 2 — Create brands on TikTok Shop

paragraphs.first: Before starting the catalog integration, it is essential to create product brands. This step prevents blocks or errors during processing.
paragraphs.second: In addition, brand authorization proves that the seller has permission to sell products on TikTok Shop.

alert.title: Brand name
alert.description: It will be necessary to link the brand in the VTEX app brand mapping. Therefore, save exactly the same name used in VTEX. Pay attention to spelling variations (uppercase/lowercase), as the match must be identical.

content.title: Before you start (Essential prerequisites)
content.description: Make sure you have the following before starting the integration.

vtexAccount.title: Active VTEX account
vtexAccount.description: Have products, inventory, and commercial policy configured (the main policy is sufficient). Your VTEX account must be configured as a marketplace.

tiktokSeller.title: TikTok Shop Seller account
tiktokSeller.description: Create your seller account on TikTok Shop to start the integration.

alert.title: Important
alert.description: Currently, the Corebiz connector works only with the main VTEX account. For sub-account scenarios, a specific analysis is required.

footer.text: If you already have everything above, you are ready for Step 2.
